thanksgivingTiming.rationale: Thanksgiving is perfect for Netflix deal announcement - maximum family viewing time
thanksgivingTiming.impact: High - families together, increased viewership potential

nyeFinale.rationale: New Year's Eve finale creates maximum buzz and anticipation

nydVictory.rationale: New Year's Day victory announcement - fresh start, new beginnings
nydVictory.impact: Maximum - symbolic victory, perfect timing for new year

weeklyRhythm.rationale: Daily content keeps audience engaged and builds habit

platformStaggering.rationale: Maximizes reach across different audience segments
platformStaggering.impact: Medium - broader reach, reduced algorithm conflicts

highnooncartoon.com.name: HighNoonCartoon.com
highnooncartoon.com.description: Primary platform - timestamped & indexed by Google

recommendations.recommendation: Launch Episode 1 on highnooncartoon.com first, then stagger across platforms
Focus on educational content to ensure compliance across all states
recommendations.rationale: Educational content has broader distribution rights

recommendations.recommendation: Prioritize YouTube Shorts and TikTok for maximum viral potential
recommendations.rationale: Short-form content performs best on these platforms

recommendations.recommendation: Implement membership system with R&D conversion funnel
recommendations.rationale: Direct monetization while building customer base

recommendations.recommendation: Implement age verification and compliance disclaimers
Build anticipation with teaser content and behind-the-scenes
recommendations.rationale: Creates buzz and builds audience before launch
